mapper.select: SELECT A.MID AS MID FROM PC_MEMBER A WHERE A.DELYN = 'Y' AND A.MID = #{mid}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.MNUM AS MNUM ,A.MNAME AS MNAME ,A.MID AS MID ,A.MHP AS MHP ,A.MEMAIL AS MEMAIL ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.IDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IDATE
,CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.MNUM DESC)/ #{pageSize}) AS PAGESIZE ,COUNT(A.MNUM) OVER() AS TOTALCOUNT FROM PC_MEMBER A WHERE A.DELYN = 'Y'
AND A.MNUM LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND A.MID LIKE '%' || #{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
)
WHERE PAGESIZE = #{curPage} ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.MNUM AS MNUM ,A.MNAME AS MNAME ,A.MID AS MID
,A.MHP AS MHP ,A.MEMAIL AS MEMAIL ,A.MPET AS MPET ,A.MINFO AS MINFO ,A.DELYN AS DELYN ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.IDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS IDATE ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.UDATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDATE FROM PC_MEMBER A WHERE A.DELYN = 'Y' AND A.MNUM = #{mnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE PC_MEMBER SET DELYN = 'N' ,UDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELYN = 'Y' AND MNUM = #{ mnum }
